CASE FILE #06b

ESCALATING PRESSURE

Date: 5/8/2020

"When subtle traps fail, sometimes you must build an obvious one and see who comes to spring it."

CLASSIFICATION: TOP SECRET
ACCESS LEVEL: SHADOW PROTOCOL PERSONNEL ONLY

Mission Summary

Yacht operation failure confirms existence of highly capable protector.

Malhotra abandons subtle approach for direct confrontation strategy.

Dr. Kumar's surveillance increased to maximum operational levels.

Building-based trap designed to force protector into vulnerable position.

Key Evidence

Failure Analysis

Malhotra's assessment of yacht operation and protector capabilities.

#analysis#failure

Surveillance Increase

Documentation of enhanced monitoring protocols around Dr. Kumar.

#surveillance#escalation

Building Selection

Strategic analysis of chosen building for final confrontation.

#strategy#location

Mission Outcome

STATUS: FINAL TRAP PREPARED
Malhotra abandons subtlety for direct confrontation with Alpha's protector.

Comprehensive surveillance network established around Dr. Kumar.

Building selected provides controlled environment for confrontation.

Malhotra prepared for direct engagement with unknown operative.

Trap designed to be obvious enough to draw out protective response.
